name: Lost in the Forest
description:
Join the adventures of a little boy that is lost in the forest.
You must avoid all the forest creatures, like the fox, the frog, the hedgehog and many others (even a shark).
Travel through many locations and try to find your way back.
There are 20 levels filled with action. You will need to avoid spikes, use jumpers that will get you a new jump bonus, jump on popping balloons, switch gravity, push boxes, avoid creatures and collect diamonds. Each level contains 3 diamonds. Can you collect them all 60?
Good luck.
